channel.title: New minigame
channel.description: [b]So I want it to show the name of the minigame I made, in the pop up it shows when you click "MiniGames Teleport" (This is Delta).. I kept trying to do it, I compiled, and it would show an error.. like 100 errors.. What am I supposed to do? I know how to make a minigame, I just don't know how to put it in the pop up and I also would like to show a picture of the MiniGame, not exactly like the minigame, just the best thing that it drops..[/b]

item.title: New minigame
item.dc:creator: @3_Days_Grace 3 Days Grace
item.description:
@3_Days_Grace wrote:

So I want it to show the name of the minigame I made, in the pop up it shows when you click “MiniGames Teleport” (This is Delta)…
I kept trying to do it, I compiled, and it would show an error… like 100 errors…
What am I supposed to do?
I know how to make a minigame, I just don’t know how to put it in the pop up and I also would like to show a picture of the MiniGame, not exactly like the minigame, just the best thing that it drops…

Read full topic
